item.description:
UPDATE 12/28/2011: Just found out that the band will be starting at 8:00pm, so we are moving the dinner reservation to 7:00pm to make it easier on the waitstaff. If this will change your plans, please update your RSVP as soon as possible. The schedule for the night will be as follows:

7:00pm - dinner upstairs

8pm - 12:30 am Band playing, dancing, laughter and fun

 

 

 

UPDATE 12/27/2011: Dinner reservations are now closed but if you would like to join us after dinner, please come along and join us for a great night of dancing, laughter and fun. If you were still planning on attending dinner and didn't make the cutoff, please let me know by noon on 12/31 and I will see if I could possibly fit you in when I call in the final count. Hope to see you all there to ring in the New Year.

 

 

 

 

UPDATE 12/24/2011: We have made an agreement with Michael's and have reserverved our table upstairs near the band. Ask for the table for Meetup/Janet/Donna.

 

 

 

Bring in the New Year with Don't Call Me Shirley.

We will be going out to Michael's Harborside for a great night of good food, great music and a whole lot of fun and laughter.

We will have more details as they are available but what we do know at this point is:

Michael's will be having special $20.12 prices for dinner.

Don't Call Me Shirley will be playing an 8pm-12:30am.

So don't stay home alone on New Year's Eve, come out and join us for a great night of fun.

Remember to bring the Meetup Cell phone with you (978-304-2811) in case you get lost, are running late or can't find us.

 

Don't forget to check this site often for updates to this event and to watch for all the great events being planned for the Fall/Winter.

 

HOpe to see you all at Michael's

Donna & Janet
item.name: NYE with Shirley @ Michael's Harborside
